---
title: "Apple Cinnamon Muffins"
description: |
  Chunks of apple and the cinnamon make these delicious muffins with a great texture.
date: 03-20-2021
categories:
  - baked
  - muffin
  - apple
  - breakfast
---

Bake at 400F for 20 - 25 min. Makes 24 muffins.


## Ingredients

### Dry

* 3 cups all purpose flour
* 1.5 cups white sugar
* 4 tsp baking powder
* 2 tsp ground cinnamon

### Wet

* 3/4 cup vegetable oil
* 2 eggs
* 3/4 cup milk
* 2 cups apple, peeled, cored and chopped (3 - 4 regular sized apples)


## Directions

Mix dry ingredients, and then mix in wet. Fold in chopped apples. Prepare muffin tin with oil, butter, or liners. Spoon batter into muffin tin.

Bake at 400F for 20 - 25 minutes, turning at 10 minutes.
